mapper.select: SELECT repair.id as id, repair.name as name, repair.age as age, repair.sex as sex, repair.tel as tel, repair.address as address, type.content as type, repair.create_date as createDate from repair,type where (repair.type_id=type.id ) and (repair.name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or repair.tel like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or type.content like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%'))
